author: Malkeet Singh
title: problem set 6
question:
Hello, 
Could someone tell me what is the meaning of [3-2-1] type of numbers in the data provided?
Thanks,
student_answer:
If you look at the data definition for course in PSET 6 you should be able to deduce what the numbers mean, I'm not sure I'm allowed to answer that further.
The [3-2-1] means the number of hours allocated to each part of a course. The first number is hours in lectures, the second number is hours in labs, and the third number is hours in tutorials.
